briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Eculizumab in Guillain-Barré Syndrome
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Prospective, Multicenter, Double Blind, Randomized, Placebo Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Eculizumab in Patients With Guillain-Barré Syndrome (GBS)
summary:
This is a Phase 3, prospective, multicenter, placebo controlled, double blind, randomized study to investigate the efficacy and safety of eculizumab in participants with severe GBS, defined using the Hughes Functional Grade (FG) scale as progressively deteriorating FG3 or FG4/FG5 within 2 weeks from onset of weakness due to GBS.

This study will be conducted only at sites in Japan.

primaryOutcome.measure: Time to First Reaching a Hughes Functional Grade (FG) Score <=1
